display_long_description:
**The world’s most legendary board game reimagined with magic, battles, and VR.**

Whether you're here to relax, learn, or compete, Merlin’s Chess brings strategy and fantasy together in the most immersive way possible.

# Includes:

**🚨 Official CHESS.COM Integration!**

Challenge over 200 million Chess.com users, or play against official Chess.com Bots of the world champions, athletes, and celebrity content creators. Enjoy first-of-kind cross-play.
[media]

**♟️ Animated Chessboards**

Massive or tabletop-sized pieces come to life and clash each other with sound and visual effects.
[media]

**✋🏻 Full Hand Tracking Support**
[media]

**🎙️ Voice Commands**

Command the board like a true wizard. Use natural language to move pieces, and perform in-game actions.[media]

**🎨 Environments & Piece Sets**

Choose between various theme options to craft your own gameplay experience.[media]

**🌐 Multiple Game Modes**

Use Casual/Ranked modes to play chess with popular Time Controls. Switch to Spectator Mode to join others and make it a Chess Party, or test your skills against AI opponents in AI Mode.[media]

**👫Make New Friends**

Customizable Avatars, Voice Chat, and Friendship System. Find your people, or bring your own. Includes safety features like Mute & Block.[media]

# Upcoming Features
- Puzzle Mode
- Mixed Reality Support
- Merlin's Chess Academy
- New Environments, Piece Sets, AI Opponents

Choose between various theme options to craft your own gameplay experience.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499296266_1009389674718098_2104839521647028073_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-ryqEAyzvyEQ7kNvwHOiwSD&_nc_oc=AdkY5i_ZoWFyI_QHjYOEYvEozHdVlqoAxejlcijY1uECDPeOiaA5MCYU-3cxbOBNvHQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=s683GXVLzZN-I6JQfv68mQ&oh=00_AfMhDYCHnW2ReHvCgiFHdJjzQJmA2JoONsjZT0QAl2JyaA&oe=68590189)

**🌐 Multiple Game Modes**

Use Casual/Ranked modes to play chess with popular Time Controls. **👫Make New Friends**

Customizable Avatars, Voice Chat, and Friendship System. Find your people, or bring your own. Includes safety features like Mute & Block.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499310899_9786339248068928_937922751158091890_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=iKWGXzLBfmAQ7kNvwFy4Vuy&_nc_oc=AdlISViARnfEZb9tZZHsH2RaGbeePUKVFYYCwo9YId0GQu06Fdc3Wc3sYnWiFX7u_9s&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=s683GXVLzZN-I6JQfv68mQ&oh=00_AfN5nxrvb4uUoDJckNhFsoRGea9gw7iDtM-7WuRmP1CsmQ&oe=68590F62)
